about_the_game:
We Have To Let You Go is a puzzle RPG game about getting fired (literally) by your totalitarian dictator boss and going on a journey to stop his new business prospects to take over the world.

Features


  • 6 sprawling chapters with plenty of secrets to uncover.
  • Classic Dragon Quest inspired battles with puzzle elements.
  • Over 20 unique abilities that offer constant creativity in battle.
  • Challenging boss fights that require skill and strategy to overcome.
  • A vital dodge mechanic that adds a risk and reward factor to combat.
  • A large cast of delightful characters to meet on your journey.
  • A cute and colorful pixel art style.
  • Several collectables and optional side quests.
  • An ever-changing soundtrack that develops throughout the adventure.

We Have To Let You Go will release in 2025

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains mild swearing, occasional fantasy violence, and contains mature and unsettling themes that may not be appropriate for all ages. All content is displayed in a cartoonish, pixel-art style and is not intended to be realistic.

Minimum:

short_description: We Have To Let You Go is a puzzle RPG game created from the ground up using the RPG Maker engine. Players will traverse several vibrant worlds interconnected by an engrossing character-driven storyline, and a strategic battle system.
